titles.title: Designating minority membership on certain standing committees of the House.

action.text: Mr. Pallone asked unanimous consent to consider as introduced.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 4/17/1997--Introduced. Elects the following Members to the following House Committees: (1) Tim Holden and Nick Lampson to Transportation and Infrastructure; (2) Ellen O. Tauscher to Science; (3) Jim Davis to International Relations; (4) Ciro D. Rodriguez to National Security; (5) Lloyd Doggett to Resources; and (6) Harold E. Ford, Jr. to Government Reform and Oversight.
